update.name: MiXplorer v4.6.5 (201405311)
update.log:
v4.6.5: - Fixed decrypting EncFs files. - Fixed Add new file/folder issue. - Fixed deleting Encfs volume. - Disabled Copy.com on previous versions. - Fixed uploading to Copy.com and Baidu storage. - Fixed login to webdav. - Plus some tiny changes.
v4.6.4: - Added opening zip files everywhere as fast as possible. - Most of features are improved and optimized. - Fixed a lot of bugs.
